data.title: highschool
data.name: Shirayuri High School
data.description: During my first year of highschool, I joined a study abroad program for the whole year. Through this program, I studied at Pioneer Highschool, Michigan, USA.

data.title: bachelor
data.name: Tokyo Instite of Technology
data.description:
My final thesis for the bachelor degree was titled 'Generalization measures using Information matrices for Deep Neural Network', which was supervised by Assoc. Prof. Rio Yokota.
 During my free time, I have joined TEDxTitech from 2016 to 2018, and worked at the speaker team and a leader for the tech team. I am also a member of EPATS.

data.title: master
data.name: Tokyo Institute of Technology
data.description: I will continue working with Assoc. Prof. Rio Yokota.

data.title: highschool
data.name: 白百合学園高等学校
data.description: 高校1年の時に1年間アメリカのミシガン州にて高校留学を行った．

data.title: bachelor
data.name: 東京工業大学
data.description:
横田理央研にて，「深層ニューラルネットワークにおける情報行列を用いた汎化指標誤差推定」という題目で卒業論文を書いた．
また，TEDxTitechに2016年から2018年で参加し，スピーカーチームやテックチームのリーダーとして活動を行なった．

data.title: master
data.name: 東京工業大学
data.description: 引き続き横田理央研究室に所属する．
